title: SCMPD: New Jersey Avenue shooting was accidental
content:
SAVANNAH, GA (WTOC) -
The Savannah-Chatham Metropolitan Police Department is investigating an accidental shooting that occurred on the 1400 block of New Jersey Street at approximately 7 p.m. Sunday.
Officials say a male juvenile was taken to Memorial University Medical Center with serious injuries. Detectives believe the incident occurred outside and the injured teen and all other parties involved in the incident are known to each other.
The incident remains under investigation.
Anyone with any additional information is asked to contact the SCMPD tip line by dialing 912.525.3124.
Information may also be forwarded to CrimeStoppers at 912.234.2020. Tipsters remain anonymous and may qualify for a cash reward.
